sentences.en: ...a more genuinely internationalist view of U.S. participation in peacekeeping.
sentences.cn: ...一种美国参与维和的更真诚的国际主义观点。
参加国际比赛的苏格兰橄榄球队队员

sentences.en: Doctor Bethune's internationalist spirit is altogether admirable.
sentences.cn: 白求恩大夫的国际主义精神十分可佩.

sentences.en: James's liberal internationalist views are shared by the author.
sentences.cn: 本书作者赞同威廉?詹姆斯的自由国际主义观点.

sentences.en: Maintaining world peace is our unshirkable internationalist duty.
sentences.cn: 维护世界和平是我们义不容辞的国际主义义务.
奥巴马是一位国际主义者.

sentences.en: Otherwise, we would be betraying our internationalist duty.
sentences.cn: 否则我们就会背弃我们的国际主义义务.

sentences.en: They praised him as a proletarian internationalist fighter of the Bethune type.
sentences.cn: 他们称赞他是白求恩式的无产阶级国际主义战士.

sentences.en: We will resolutely perform our internationalist duty no matter what happens.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么情况,我们都要坚决履行我们的国际主义义务.

sentences.en: You will need to be the most internationalist generation of leaders in China's history.
sentences.cn: 你们将要成为中国历史上最具国际主义观念的一代领导人.

words.tran_cn: 使国际化；置于国际管理下
国际主义者；国际法学家

trans.tran_en: If someone has internationalist beliefs or opinions, they believe that countries should work with, help, and be friendly with one another
